title: G3 Support Main lookin for clash team
body:
Like title says, support main lookin for clash team. 
If its a champ, I can play it as a support. 
Main ones are Leona, Brand and Zilean. 

Can do other roles, Top being second best pick. 
Add me and lemme know if ya interested bois.

replies.body: Okay great i found a gold mid laner as well
im a adc/jg player gold if you want to be a duo to find a team
Hey join my discord server and PM me! (Jack) https://discord.gg/nUn5Zjw
